q: Gary Moore had no timetable for Allen Iverson 's surgery, only that that it was`` soon.''`` People need to know that Allen Iverson is and always has been a fighter,'' Gary Moore said. He's got a battle ahead of him. Gary Moore said Allen Iverson `` totally disputes'' reports out of Turkey that he was set to retire. Michael Vick tells NFL commissioner Roger Goodell he's not hosting Super Bowl party Michael Vick has told NFL commissioner Roger Goodell that he will not be hosting a Super Bowl XLV party. He has said that on numerous occasions people have been using his name about being involved in some type of a party and he had no intention of participating in that, Roger Goodell said. Speaking at his annual Super Bowl news conference on Friday, the commissioner said he's spoken with Michael Vick three times in the last two weeks about his plans.`` I want

his time devoted to customers and partners. " We have been late at adding social capabilities to our core products'' " Eric Schmidt Google executive chairman Referring to the Davos shindig, he said that the great regret is that there are not more Chinese leaders here- both political leaders as well as business leaders - in contrast with the number of Indian attendees. He said Google's leadership reshuffle was a`` clarification of roles'' intended`` simply so that we could make decisions more quickly''.

European Union had said it would impose sanctions on Mr Dacoury-Tabley, making his position untenable. According to a declaration of heads of state from West Africa's single-currency zone after an emergency meeting in MAli Coulibaly: The conference is concerned about the impact of the non-application of the decision[ on Mr Gbagbo] on the stability of the economic, financial and monetary system of the union.`` The conference has taken note of the resignation of Mr Philippe Henri Dacoury-Tabley from his post. Mr Dacoury-Tabley blamed`` technical reasons'' for not applying the measure. Alassane Ouattara ally Patrick Achi told Reuters news agency the resignation had been`` what we have been calling for''.``

Donald Rumsfeld : Guantanamo one of world's` finest' prisons WASHINGTON- The`` war on terror'' prison at the US naval base in Guantanamo Bay, Cuba is one of the finest prison systems in the world, former defense secretary Donald Rumsfeld said in an interview with Fox News on Tuesday. Donald Rumsfeld , who is promoting his autobiography titled`` Known and Unknown,'' praised US military personnel that worked at the site in
